content: **knitted short-sleeved jumper in drops belle the piece is worked top down with raglan and relief-pattern sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern vs-110 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 300-300-350-400-400-450 g colour 04 dandelion **needles** drops circular needles size 4 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needles size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
